Package graph

Interface WeightedEdge<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the nodes.
All Superinterfaces:
Edge<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
WeightedEdgeClass
public interface WeightedEdge<T> extends Edge<T>
Represents an weighted edge with a cost and attractiveness related to its traversing.

  • Method Details

    • setWeight

      void setWeight(int weight) throws InvalidWeightException
      Sets the value of the weight to a certain edge.
      Parameters:
      weight - The weight of the corresponding edge.
      Throws:
      InvalidWeightException - if the weight is invalid.

    • setAttractiveness

      void setAttractiveness(double attractiveness)
      Sets the cost to a certain edge.
      Parameters:
      attractiveness - The attractiveness of traversing this edge.

    • decreaseAttractiveness

      void decreaseAttractiveness(double units)
      Decreases the attractiveness of a certain edge.
      Parameters:
      units - Will decrease the attractiveness by the units passed.
